description: square box bank with cut off corners of silver-colored metal on one side and edges; wood grain on one side with instructions; on front is a doorway with 2 pillars on each side and an eagle above; a little window to one side of doorway registers dimes
inscription:
Inscription


on back, in black: [MADE IN U.S.A.]
on front, in relief: [LUCKY/ DIME REGISTER/ BANK/ PATENT PEND.]
title: "Lucky Dime Register Bank (registering)" still bank
